name: TanksAndDrones
description:
Some assets / code from:

Brackeys, Blackthornprod, craigsmith e, eflexmusic, nickjonesaudio, robertBu, bennett_apps

shift-dash, wasd-movement, q-switch gun, left mouse - shoot

There are five waves every five wave you are given health there is a way to get out of the arena.

PS. I forgot to code in a way to exit so just ctrl alt delete if the game is not windowed.
